goals.active: Defend the grawl from the false god's wrath.
goals.complete: We killed the ice dragon minions that came to destroy Gara's village, but at a terrible cost: the village and many of the villagers were lost in the fighting. Most of Gara's people survived, however, and Gara was grateful. Having finally realized the scope of the threat the Elder Dragons pose to all of Tyria, he swore to help us in our fight against them, just as we helped him.
